form.p: This template will create a project with an example proto3 file (in protofiles/health.proto). The protoc code generation (added to bnd/bndtools
by maven central given by org.eclipse.ecf:org.eclipse.ecf.bndtools.grpc:<version>. This generator will read the health.proto file and
generate the protobuf, grpc, and reactivex 3x java code for the service as part of either an incremental or whole project builds.
Protoc-generated java code will be output to the src-gen directory and subsequently compiled, packaged, etc. by bndtools.
